name: cs50-final-project
description: Sofiane's final project. Stack used :  | Area     | Tech                                                      | | -------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | | Frontend | HTML, CSS (or Tailwind), JS                               | | Backend  | Python (Flask)                                            | | DB       | SQLite (easy with CS50)                                   | | Hosting  | GitHub Pages (static) or Render/Heroku (Flask)            | | Bonus    | Flask-WTF, Flask-Mail (contact form), Flask-Login (admin) |
